text: femur 90% Exostoses 90% Limitation of joint mobility 90% Multiple enchondromatosis 90% Arthralgia - Arthralgia of the hip - Autosomal dominant inheritance - Broad femoral neck - Flattened femoral head - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough estimate of the percentage of patient
